title: Portfolio
description: This is a simple portfolio page build using React.js

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: The page is designed with simplicity in mind. The focus is put on presenting the projects showcased. Each project has a dedicated page which aims to present it in greater detail and also show the considerations and potential challenges encountered during development.

sections.title: Reasoning
sections.content: I have decided to use React for this project in order to further develop and improve my skills using this library. Also this has given me the opportunity to implement a modular design and create various elements that can be reused in different projects.

sections.title: Challenges
sections.content: The initial implementation of the Portfolio a single component held all the information about the projects. However I have quickly realized this method would put a lot of strain on the React Router methods to determine what to render. This also made content editing and adding new projects extremely difficult. To solve these problems I have decided to create a single component for displaying projects which loads a JSON file corresponding to the properties set by React Router. The <ProjectDetails /> component loads the JSON and displays the details of the corresponding project. While this leads to a bit longer load times (few extra ms to load the JSON), I have added page transition animations using React-Motion, which help fill up the loading times.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.content: I intend to continue development of the Porftfolio over time. The next step would be to create a REST API that can automatically generate the required JSON files from a MongoDB database.
